message: Ship accident: A huge cargo ship had a fatal accident and all its containers full of plastic wrapping, toys, packaging, etc. are floating in the sea. Bad news for everone who wants to save the world!
A huge plastic-comet hit the world.
One of the biggest plastic manufacturer building exploded and spreaded plastic trash everywhere.
Hurricane Theresa swirls up a coastal garbage dump.
Garbage dump starts slipping due to strong rainfalls.
The litter service is on general strike. Piling garbage everywhere!!!
An earthquake destroys a highly radioactive atomic waste disposal site.
Countries dump radioactive material in the sea.
Trump's tweet 'Recycling does not exist' has a negative impact. People are mercilessly throwing their trash out of the window.
A rich sheik wants to help you save the world. Here have some money!
